title: New: The 1975 â€“ M.O.N.E.Y.
content:
Having packed out tents at both Leeds and Reading Festival over the weekend, The 1975 are all set to release their highly anticipated debut LP on Monday.

M.O.N.E.Y., lifted from the record, is yet another example of the diversity the Manchester group posses. Jai Paul-esque basslines alongside the almost rapped vocals of lead singer Matt Healy, the album is sure to be a contender for no.1 next week. Check out M.O.N.E.Y. below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
